import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { data } from '../datas/data' import Header from '../components/Header' import '../assets/styles/Bien.scss' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faAngleDown, faAngleUp, faAngleLeft, faAngleRight, faStar } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { useState } from 'react' import Carousel from '../components/carousel' function Title() { const { id } = useParams() const bien = data.find((item) => item.id === id) const host = bien.host const equipments = bien.equipments let i = 0; const showTag = (tag) => { return tag.map((tag, index) => ( {tag} )) } const starRating = (rating) => { return Array.from({ length: 5 }, (_, index) => ( )) } return (

{bien.title}

{bien.location}
{host.name}
{showTag(bien.tags)}
{starRating(bien.rating)}
Descriprion

{bien.description}

Equipements
    {equipments.map((e , index ) => (
  • {e}
    • ))}
) } export default Title
